SA07n938:2: śrutvā tataḥ sadvratamutsisṛkṣuṃ bhāryāṃ didṛkṣuṃ bhavanaṃ vivikṣum |
SA07n938:5: sa hrīmate hrīvinato jagāda svaṃ niścayaṃ niścayakovidāya ||2 ||
SA07n938:6: nandaṃ viditvā sugatastatastaṃ bhāryābhidhāne tamasi bhramantam |
SA07n938:7: pāṇau gṛhītvā viyadutpapāta malaṃ jale sādhurivojjihīrṣuḥ ||3 ||
SA07n938:14: śāntendriye tatra munau sthite tu savismayaṃ dikṣu dadarśa nandaḥ |
SA07n938:15: darīśca kuñjāṃśca vanaukasaśca vibhūṣaṇaṃ rakṣaṇameva cādreḥ ||7 ||
SA07n938:16: bahvāyate tatra site hi śṛṅge saṃkṣiptabarhaḥ śayito mayūraḥ |
SA07n938:21: babhau gireḥ prasravaṇa pipāsurditsan pitṛbhyo'mbha ivāvatīrṇaḥ ||10 ||
SA07n938:22: calatkadambe himavannitambe tarau pralambe camaro lalambe |
SA07n938:23: chettuṃ vilagnaṃ na śaśāka bālaṃ kulodgatāṃ prītimivāryavṛttaḥ ||11 ||
SA07n938:32: kā nanda rūpeṇa ca ceṣṭayā ca saṃpaśyataścārutarā matā te |
SA07n938:33: eṣā mṛgī vaikavipannadṛṣṭiḥ sa vā jano yatra gatā taveṣṭiḥ ||16 ||
SA07n938:34: ityevamuktaḥ sugatena nandaḥ kṛtvā smitaṃ kiṃcididaṃ jagāda |
SA07n938:35: kva cottamastrī bhagavan vadhūste mṛgī nagakleśakarī kva caiṣā ||17 ||
SA07n938:36: tato munistasya niśamya vākyaṃ hetvantaraṃ kiṃcidavekṣamāṇaḥ |
SA07n938:37: ālambya nandaṃ prayayau tathaiva krīḍāvanaṃ vajradharasya rājñaḥ ||18 ||
SA07n938:38: ṛtāvṛtāvākṛtimeka eke kṣaṇe kṣaṇe bibhrati yatra vṛkṣāḥ |
SA07n938:40: puṣyanti kecit surabhīrudārā mālāḥ srajaśca granthitā vicitrāḥ |
SA07n938:42: raktāni phullāḥ kamalāni yatra pradīpavṛkṣā iva bhānti vṛkṣāḥ |
SA07n938:45: atāntavānyekaghanāni yatra sūkṣmāṇi vāsāṃsi phalanti vṛkṣāḥ ||22 ||
SA07n938:50: yatrāyatāṃścaiva tatāṃśca tāṃstān vādyasya hetūn suṣirān ghanāṃśca |
SA07n938:53: ākramya māhātmyaguṇairvirājan rājāyate yatra sa pārijātaḥ ||26 ||
SA07n938:67: manāṃsi khinnāni tapodhanānāṃ haranti yatrāpsaraso laḍantyaḥ ||33 ||
SA07n938:68: nityotsavaṃ taṃ ca niśāmya lokaṃ nistandrinidrāratiśokarogam |
SA07n938:69: nando jarāmṛtyuvaśaṃ sadārtaṃ mene śmaśānapratimaṃ nṛlokam ||34 ||
SA07n938:70: aindraṃ vanaṃ tacca dadarśa nandaḥ samantato vismayaphulladṛṣṭiḥ |
SA07n938:72: sadā yuvatyo madanaikakāryāḥ sādhāraṇāḥ puṇyakṛtāṃ vihārāḥ |
SA07n938:78: tāḥ niḥsṛtāḥ prekṣya vanāntarebhyastaḍitpatākā iva toyadebhyaḥ |
SA07n938:79: nandasya rāgeṇa tanurvivepe jale cale candramasaḥ prabheva ||39 ||
SA07n938:80: vapuśca divyaṃ lalitāśca ceṣṭāstataḥ sa tāsāṃ manasā jahāra |
SA07n938:83: lolendriyāśvena manorathena jehrīyamāṇo na dhṛtiṃ cakāra ||41 ||
SA07n938:84: yathā manuṣyo malinaṃ hi vāsaḥ kṣāreṇa bhūyo malinīkaroti |
SA07n938:86: doṣāṃśca kāyād bhiṣagujjihīrṣurbhūyo yathā kleśayituṃ yateta |
SA07n938:90: mahacca rūpaṃ svaṇu hanti rūpaṃ śabdo mahān hanti ca śabdamalpam |
SA07n938:91: gurvī rujā hanti rujāṃ ca mṛdvīṃ sarvo mahān heturaṇorvadhāya ||45 ||
SA07n938:93: avītarāgasya hi durbalasya mano dahedapsarasāṃ vapuḥśrīḥ ||46 ||
SA07n938:96: etāḥ striyaḥ paśya divaukasastvaṃ nirīkṣya ca brūhi yathārthatattvam |
SA07n938:97: etāḥ kathaṃ rūpaguṇairmatāste sa vā jano yatra gataṃ manaste ||48 ||
SA07n938:102: āsthā yathā pūrvamabhūnna kācidanyāsu me strīṣu niśāmya bhāryām |
SA07n938:103: tasyāṃ tataḥsamprati kācidāsthā na me niśāmyaiva hi rūpamāsām ||51 ||
SA07n938:104: yathā pratapto mṛdunātapena dahyeta kaścin mahatānalena |
SA07n938:106: vāgvāriṇāṃ māṃ pariṣiñca tasmādyāvanna dahye sa ivābjaśatruḥ |
SA07n938:107: rāgāgniradyaiva hiṃ māṃ didhakṣuḥ kakṣaṃ savṛkṣāgramivotthito'gniḥ ||53 ||
SA07n938:108: prasīda sīdāmi vimuñca mā mune vasundharādhairya na dhairyamasti me |
SA07n938:109: asūn vimokṣyāmi vimuktamānasa prayaccha vā vāgamṛtaṃ mumūrṣave ||54 ||
SA07n938:111: ahaṃ hi daṣṭo hṛdi manmathāhinā vidhatsva tasmādagadaṃ mahābhiṣak ||55 ||
SA07n938:112: anena daṣṭo madanāhinā'hinā na kaścidātmanyanavasthitaḥ sthitaḥ |
SA07n938:113: mumoha bodhyorhyacalātmano mano babhūva dhīmāṃśca sa śantanustanuḥ ||56 ||
SA07n938:114: sthite viśiṣṭe tvayi saṃśraye śraye yathā na yāmīha vasan diśaṃ diśam |
SA07n938:115: yathā ca labdhvā vyasanakṣayaṃ kṣayaṃ vrajāmi tanme kuru śaṃsataḥ sataḥ ||57 ||
SA07n938:116: tato jighāṃsurhṛdi tasya tattamastamonudo naktamivotthitaṃ tamaḥ |
SA07n938:118: dhṛtiṃ pariṣvajya vidhūya vikriyāṃ nigṛhya tāvacchrutacetasī śṛṇu |
SA07n938:119: imā yadi prārthayase tvamaṅganā vidhatsva śuklārthamihottamaṃ tapaḥ ||59 ||
SA07n938:120: imā hi śakyā na balānna sevayā na saṃpradānena na rūpavattayā |
SA07n938:121: imā hriyante khalu dharmacaryayā sacet praharṣaścara dharmamādṛtaḥ ||60 ||
SA07n938:122: ihādhivāso divi daivataiḥ samaṃ vanāni ramyāṇyajarāśca yoṣitaḥ |
SA07n938:123: idaṃ phalaṃ svasya śubhasya karmaṇo na dattamanyena na cāpyahetutaḥ ||61 ||
SA07n938:124: kṣitau manuṣyo dhanurādibhiḥ śramaiḥ striyaḥ kadāciddhi labheta vā na vā |
SA07n938:125: asaṃśayaṃ yattviha dharmacaryayā bhaveyuretā divi puṇyakarmaṇaḥ ||62 ||
SA07n938:127: ahaṃ ca te'tra pratibhūḥ sthire vrate yathā tvamābhiniyataṃ sameṣyasi ||63 ||
SA07n938:128: ataḥparaṃ paramamiti vyavasthitaḥ parāṃ dhṛtiṃ paramamunau cakāra saḥ |
SA07n938:129: tato muniḥ pavana ivāmbarāt patan pragṛhya taṃ punaragamanmahītalam ||64 ||
SA07n938:130: saundarananda mahākāvye “svarga-darśana“ nāma daśama sarga samāpta |
